attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Create IOS XR 7.0.1 MDT config for incident response: stream IPv4 ACL telemetry statistics with higher cadence using ipv4-acl-oper sensor paths. Use gRPC no TLS. Server 192.0.2.187 port 57500. Sample every 30 seconds."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
{"response": "telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group ACL-STATISTICS
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list/acl-name
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list/application-id
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:destination-address
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:destination-address-mask
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:destination-operator
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:destination-port-group
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:destination-port1
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:destination-port2
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:destination-prefix-group
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:dscp
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:dscp-operator
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:dscp-present
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:dscp2
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:dynamic
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:fragment-flags
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:fragment-offset-operator
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:fragment-offset1
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:fragment-offset2
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:fragments
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:grant
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper:ipv4-acl-and-prefix-list:access-list-name
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.187
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription INCIDENT-RESPONSE
  sensor-group-id ACL-STATISTICS sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"}
